({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt;    ...prevNodes,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : {   event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const buttonRect = event.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const left = Math.min(buttonRect.left, window.innerWidth - 260);\n deleteTree = (treeId) =&gt; {\n    const tree = treesById[treeId];\n    if (!tree) return;\n    const ok = window.confirm(&#96;Delete \"${tree.title}\"? {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; }}\n        ref={sidebarRef}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"sidebar-title-row\"&gt;\n            &lt;div&gt;\n              &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n              &lt;p &gt;\n                {treeList.length} {treeList.length === 1 ? \"tree\" : \"trees\"}\n              &lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;div className=\"sidebar-actions\"&gt;\n              &lt;button\n                type=\"button\"\n                className=\"collapse-tree-button\"\n                onClick={() =&gt; }

Moved the node count out of the tree title button and into a right-aligned actions cluster next to the options icon, and added a “Only active/Show all” toggle to collapse the list to the current tree. This keeps the list cleaner while still showing counts where the icons live, and lets you switch between full list and single-tree view quickly. Updates are in `src/App.jsx` for the UI/state and `src/styles.css` for layout/styles.

   ...prevNodes,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n =&gt; {\n    setTreeMenu({\n      visible: false,\n      treeId: null,\n      rect: null,\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const openTreeMenu = (treeId, event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const buttonRect = event.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const left = Math.min(buttonRect.left, window.innerWidth - 260);\n deleteTree = (treeId) =&gt; {\n    const tree = treesById[treeId];\n    if (!tree) return;\n    const ok = window.confirm(&#96;Delete \"${tree.title}\"? t.id !== treeId);\n      if (remaining.length) {\n        setActiveTreeId(remaining[0].id);\n      } else {\n        // Will be set by the activeTreeId/treeList effect after state update.\n        setActiveTreeId(null);\n      }\n    }\n  };\n\n  const requestTreeTitle = async (userMessage, assistantMessage = \"\") =&gt; : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setTempHighlight(null);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setError(\"\");\n  }, [activeTreeId]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; [highlightId, branchNodeId] = meta.split(\":\");\n              if (!highlightId || !branchNodeId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;branch-highlight:${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            } else {\n              const tempId = meta;\n              if (!tempId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;temp-highlight:${tempId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            }\n\n            value = after;\n          }\n\n          if (value) {\n            nextChildren.push({ ...child, value });\n          }\n          return;\n        }\n\n        transformNode(child);\n        nextChildren.push(child);\n      });\n      node.children = nextChildren;\n      return;\n    }\n\n    Object.values(node).forEach((value) =&gt; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst remarkLatexDelimiters = () =&gt; {\n  const normalizeDelimiters = (value) =&gt;\n    value\n      .replace(/\\\\\\[/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\]/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = Object.values(node).forEach((value) =&gt; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value, nextInCode);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst STORAGE_KEY = containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const treeIdSnapshot = activeTreeId;\n    const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeIdSnapshot];\n    const isFirstRootTurn =\n      activeNodeId === \"root\" &amp;&amp; (nodeSnapshot?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    const fallbackTitle = summarizeTitle(trimmed) || \"New tree\";\n    if (isFirstRootTurn) {\n      updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n        if (tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp; !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)) return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n\n      if (isFirstRootTurn &amp;&amp; treeSnapshot) {\n        requestTreeTitle(trimmed, reply || \"\")\n          .then((title) =&gt; {\n            const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n            updateTree(treeIdSnapshot, (tree) =&gt; {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.nodeId === sourceNodeId &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.treeId === treeId) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              tempHighlight.tempId,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    } else if (selectionPopover.messageIndex != null) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== selectionPopover.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeId];\n      const baseNodes = treeSnapshot?.nodesById || nodesById;\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...baseNodes,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n        capture: true,\n      });\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n    document.body.classList.add(\"is-resizing\");\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside\n        className=\"sidebar\"\n        style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; activeTreeId: tree.id };\n};\n\nconst getSvgViewport = (containerRect, viewBoxWidth, viewBoxHeight) =&gt; {\n  // Matches preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n  const scale = Math.min(\n    containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, offsetX, offsetY };\n};\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst truncateForContext = (text, maxChars) =&gt; {\n  if (typeof text !== \"string\") 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  const breadcrumb = path\n    .map((id, index) =&gt; {\n      const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;\n      if (index === path.length - 1 &amp;&amp; id !== \"root\") {\n        return \".\";\n      }\n      return nodeTitle || (id === \"root\" ? \"Root\" : null);\n    })\n    .filter(Boolean)\n    .join(\" &gt; \");\n\n  const lines = [\n    \"Hidden context for the assistant (do lines.push(\"Ancestor snippets (most recent turns):\");\n    ancestorIds.forEach((id) =&gt; {\n      const ancestor = nodesById[id];\n      if (!ancestor) return;\n      const tail = .join(\"\\n\");\n      lines.push(&#96;- ${ancestor.title}:\\n${snippet}&#96;);\n    });\n  }\n\n  return lines.join(\"\\n\\n\").trim();\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n   updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { treeSnapshot) {\n        requestTreeTitle(trimmed, reply || \"\")\n          .then((title) =&gt; {\n            const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n            updateTree(treeIdSnapshot, (tree) =&gt; {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n          if (i !== selectionPopover.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeId];\n      const baseNodes = treeSnapshot?.nodesById || nodesById;\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...baseNodes,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  const resizeInput = (element) =&gt; {\n    if (!element) return;\n    element.style.height = \"auto\";\n    element.style.height = &#96;${element.scrollHeight}px&#96;;\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n        capture: true,\n      });\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  const updateTree = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n    ...prevNodes,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : {    rect: null,\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const openTreeMenu = (treeId, event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const {\n  const transformNode = (node) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    if (Array.isArray(node.children)) {\n      const nextChildren = [];\n      node.children.forEach((child) =&gt; };\n};\n\nconst remarkLatexDelimiters = () =&gt; {\n  const normalizeDelimiters = (value) =&gt;\n    value\n      .replace(/\\\\\\[/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\]/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = {\n    if (!selectionPopover.visible) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.text?.trim()) return;\n    if (selectionPopover.messageIndex == null) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.nodeId) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.treeId) return;\n\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n\n    const tempId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const nodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId;\n    const msgIdx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n    updateNodeMessages(selectionPopover.treeId, nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n      messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      }),\n    );\n    setTempHighlight({\n      nodeId,\n      messageIndex: msgIdx,\n      tempId,\n      treeId: selectionPopover.treeId,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n    selectionPopover.treeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n      if (!node?.hasUnread) return node;\n      return {\n        ...node,\n        hasUnread: false,\n        requestStatus: node.requestStatus === \"ready\" ? \"idle\" : node.requestStatus,\n      };\n    });\n  }, [activeTreeId, activeNodeId]);\n\n  const addNode = (treeId, parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const treeIdSnapshot = activeTreeId;\n    const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeIdSnapshot];\n    const isFirstRootTurn =\n      activeNodeId === \"root\" &amp;&amp; (nodeSnapshot?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    const fallbackTitle = summarizeTitle(trimmed) || \"New Tree\";\n    if (isFirstRootTurn) {\n      updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n        if (\n          tree.title !== \"New Tree\" &amp;&amp;\n          tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp;\n          !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)\n        )\n          return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n\n      if (isFirstRootTurn &amp;&amp; treeSnapshot) {\n        requestTreeTitle(trimmed, reply || \"\")\n          .then((title) =&gt; {\n            const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n            updateTree(treeIdSnapshot, (tree) =&gt; {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.nodeId === sourceNodeId &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.treeId === treeId) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              tempHighlight.tempId,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    } else if (selectionPopover.messageIndex != null) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== selectionPopover.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeId];\n      const baseNodes = treeSnapshot?.nodesById || nodesById;\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...baseNodes,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  const resizeInput = (element) =&gt; {\n    if (!element) return;\n    element.style.height = \"auto\";\n    element.style.height = &#96;${element.scrollHeight}px&#96;;\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; sidebar.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel);\n  }, []);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleWindowWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n      if (!sidebar) return;\n      if (!sidebar.contains(event.target)) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    window.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n      passive: false,\n      capture: true,\n    });\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n        capture: true,\n      });\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n    document.body.classList.add(\"is-resizing\");\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside\n        className=\"sidebar\"\n        style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; }}\n        ref={sidebarRef}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"sidebar-title-row\"&gt;\n            &lt;div&gt;\n              &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n              &lt;p &gt;\n                {treeList.length} {treeList.length === 1 ? \"tree\" : \"trees\"}\n              &lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;div className=\"sidebar-actions\"&gt;\n              &lt;button\n                type=\"button\"\n                className=\"collapse-tree-button\"\n                onClick={() =&gt; 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, \".\";\n      }\n      return nodeTitle || (id === \"root\" ? \"Root\" : null);\n    })\n    .filter(Boolean)\n    .join(\" &gt; \");\n\n  const lines = [\n    \"Hidden context for the assistant (do .join(\"\\n\");\n      lines.push(&#96;- ${ancestor.title}:\\n${snippet}&#96;);\n    });\n  }\n\n  return lines.join(\"\\n\\n\").trim();\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  const updateTree = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; {\n        if (\n          tree.title !== \"New Tree\" &amp;&amp;\n          tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp;\n          !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)\n        )\n          return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; }

{\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n {\n  const transformNode = (node) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    if (Array.isArray(node.children)) {\n      const nextChildren = [];\n      node.children.forEach((child) =&gt; {\n        if (child?.type === \"text\" &amp;&amp; typeof child.value === \"string\") {\n          let value = child.value;\n          while (true) {\n            const branchIdx = value.indexOf(BRANCH_HL_START);\n            const tempIdx = value.indexOf(TEMP_HL_START);\n            const startIdx =\n              branchIdx === -1\n                ? tempIdx\n                : tempIdx === -1\n                  ? branchIdx\n                  : Math.min(branchIdx, tempIdx);\n            if (startIdx === -1) break;\n            const isBranch = startIdx === branchIdx;\n            const metaEndIdx = value.indexOf(\"]]]\", startIdx);\n            if (metaEndIdx === -1) break;\n            const meta = value.slice(\n              startIdx + (isBranch ? .replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; { });\n      }\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; \"active\" : \"\"\n                        } ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n                      onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n                      onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n                      onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n                    &gt;\n                      &lt;circle cx={pos.x} cy={pos.y} r=\"34\" /&gt;\n                      {isPending &amp;&amp; (\n                        &lt;circle\n                          className=\"graph-node-badge pending\"\n                          cx={pos.x + 22}\n                          cy={pos.y - 22}\n                          r=\"6\"\n                        /&gt;\n                      )}\n                      {!isPending &amp;&amp; isReady &amp;&amp; (\n                        &lt;circle\n                          className=\"graph-node-badge ready\"\n                          cx={pos.x + 22}\n                          cy={pos.y - 22}\n                          r=\"6\"\n                        /&gt;\n                      )}\n                      &lt;text x={pos.x} y={pos.y} textAnchor=\"middle\"&gt;\n                        {words.length &gt; 1 ? {\n                      setDraft(event.target.value);\n                      resizeInput(event.target);\n                    }}\n                    onKeyDown={handleComposerKeyDown}\n                    rows={2}\n                  /&gt;\n                  &lt;button\n                    type=\"button\"\n                    className=\"send-button\"\n                    onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n                    disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                    aria-label=\"Send message\"\n                    title=\"Send\"\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2L11 13\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2l-7 20-4-9-9-4 20-7z\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/svg&gt;\n                  &lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          ) : (\n            &lt;&gt;\n              &lt;header className=\"chat-header\"&gt;\n                &lt;div&gt;\n                  &lt;h2&gt;{activeNode.title}&lt;/h2&gt;\n                  &lt;span className=\"chat-meta\"&gt;\n                    {activeNode.messages.length} messages\n                  &lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n                {shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; handleSend(draft)}\n                    disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                    aria-label=\"Send message\"\n                    title=\"Send\"\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2L11 13\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2l-7 20-4-9-9-4 20-7z\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/svg&gt;\n                  &lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/footer&gt;\n            &lt;/&gt;\n          )}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/main&gt;\n      {shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; }

---

### Updated behavior (as requested)
- **“New Tree” now stays “New Tree”** on the first message — we no longer rename it immediately (no `summarizeTitle()` fallback rename).
- The **chat naming request is fired in parallel** with the main “get assistant reply” request on the first root turn.
- When the naming request returns, it **renames the tree only if the title is still a default** (`"New Tree"` / legacy `"New tree"` / `Tree N`) so it won’t override manual renames.

---
